name: YETCARGO, S.A.P.I. de C.V
description: Developer of a logistics platform designed to connect carriers with cargo owners. The company provides real-time tracking of cargo and claims to have a portfolio of reliable carriers, enabling businesses in product shipment and transportation by connecting and dealing with air and marine logistics service providers.
